data.text: @Caro_Dew_ @NC_Robinson Or nebuliser? Sounds sort of similar?
@MattCJChisholm @NC_Robinson You don’t get ventilated for a short period w Covid

@NC_Robinson Clearly mistaken in his terminology. Possibly using a spirometer or peak flow meter as part of his physio. Could even possibly been a Cough Assist machine. At his own admission, definitely not intubated & ventilated in ICU.
@MattCJChisholm @NC_Robinson It's quite obvious to anyone with an ounce of comprehension that he was using incorrect wording and what he's talking about is not actually a ventilator.
@MattCJChisholm @NC_Robinson Lol. You don’t “trial” a ventilator. It’s not a fashion accessory, it’s a very serious procedure.
@NC_Robinson And apparently wasn’t a huge drinker

@MattCJChisholm It is clear what the true story is. He wasn't very ill, he wasn't in hospital, he wasn't suffering breathing difficulties as he stated, and he wasn't on a ventilator. He was using an incorrect term. He was clearly using some kind of other breathing machine as a preventative.
@NC_Robinson I was only going on what he stated. Who knows what the full story was behind it. You don’t know and neither do I.
